players.name: Alice
memory: You: "We should discuss our thoughts on who might be the mafioso, like Bob or Diana."
Diana: "I don't think accusing randomly helps. Bob, your silence is suspicious—why didn't you speak up?"
Diana: "Bob, your silence is really suspicious. We need to consider voting you out for the town's safety."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "We should discuss our thoughts on who might be the mafioso, like Bob or Diana."
Diana: "I don't think accusing randomly helps. Bob, your silence is suspicious—why didn't you speak up?"
Diana: "Bob, your silence is really suspicious. We need to consider voting you out for the town's safety."
